revised_title: Investigating the Variable Star in Sobieski's Shield: Observations and Conjectures on Unenlightened Heavenly Bodies
tldr: Edward Pigott investigates the variable star in Sobieski's Shield, observing its changes in brightness and rotation over a five-year period. He offers conjectures on unenlightened heavenly bodies and suggests that the star's irregularities may be due to the generation and absorption of luminous particles in its atmosphere.
